Summary: 5 orange light in a flying geese formation traveling slowly for about 40 seconds then speeding up and disappearing
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Faribault
There were no other sightings in Faribault on or around August 29th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsMy dad and two younger siblings were walking out into the backyard at 9:15 pm to camp out in a tent we had set up on August 29th when something caught my dad's eye and he said to look up. We all looked up into the sky to the south and saw 5 orange lights in a flying geese formation (V shape) One front light and one to the left and three to the right. It slowly moved to the south ( all lights moved together)for about 40 seconds then suddenly sped up and disappeared. There was no noise from the object which made it strange to us. We all were confused as to what it was and my siblings and I were afraid and decided not to camp out. Is there a aircraft that would fit this description?
